data.title: Human Resources / Employment
data.text:
Contact Us

1150 Foster Avenue

Nashville, TN 37243

(615) 251-5200

Fax: (615) 253-2095

Email: hr.safety@tn.gov

Click Search & Apply for Jobs for more information.

Paper applications are no longer accepted.

The Department of Safety & Homeland Security has job opportunities in our law enforcement divisions as well as our Driver Services, Financial Responsibility, Information Systems, Human Resources, Fiscal Services, and Legal divisions.

Equal Opportunity Employer

The State of Tennessee prohibits discrimination against applicants and employees on the basis of race, color, sex, religion, national origin, age, disability, veteranâ€™s status, or any other category protected under federal or state law in recruitment, hiring, discharge, promotion, or any other aspect of employment.
